paragraphs.content: Behold, I will cast her into hell, and them that commit adultery with her into great tribulation, except they repent of their deeds.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, I will cast her into hell, and them that commit adultery with her into great tribulation, except they repent of their deeds.

paragraphs.content: And to him who overcometh, and keepeth my commandments unto the end, will I give power over many kingdoms;
paragraphs.contentHtml: And to him who overcometh, and keepeth my commandments unto the end, will I give power over many kingdoms;

paragraphs.content: And he shall rule them with the word of God; and they shall be in his hands as the vessels of clay in the hands of a potter; and he shall govern them by faith, with equity and justice, even as I received of my Father.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he shall rule them with the word of God; and they shall be in his hands as the vessels of clay in the hands of a potter; and he shall govern them by faith, with equity and justice, even as I received of my Father.
